parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Oil Consumption and Piston Ring Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive engine oil consumption can lead to engine seizure, stalling, and potentially cause accidents. The failure of piston rings can cause the engine to stall, misfire, and produce loud noises.
symptoms: and warning lights illuminating on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine stalling and misfiring can cause accidents, especially when driving at high speeds or in heavy traffic.
symptoms: and warning lights illuminating on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission overheating can cause the transmission to fail, leading to costly repairs and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: warning lights illuminating on the dashboard

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission failure can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or become stuck in gear, leading to accidents or stranding the driver.
symptoms: the transmission temperature warning light comes on
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear
or the vehicle is unable to accelerate.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Clutch actuator failure can cause the vehicle to stall, lose power, or become stuck in gear, leading to accidents or stranding the driver.
symptoms: the clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive engine oil consumption can cause engine damage, leading to costly repairs or even engine failure.
symptoms: The vehicle consumes excessive amounts of oil
the engine makes unusual noises or has a rough idle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission temperature issues can cause the transmission to fail, leading to accidents or stranding the driver.
symptoms: The transmission temperature warning light comes on

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Reverse gear failure can cause the vehicle to become stuck or unable to move, leading to accidents or stranding the driver.
symptoms: The vehicle is unable to shift into reverse
the vehicle becomes stuck or unable to move.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the door locking mechanism can cause the door to fly open while driving, posing a safety risk to the occupants and other road users.
symptoms: The door flies open while driving
the door does not recognize that it is open
the locking mechanism on the driver's side of the vehicle seems to have given out
and the driver-side door cannot be closed.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: False Emergency Alerts and Traction Control Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The false activation of emergency alerts and traction control can cause the brakes to engage sporadically at high speeds, posing a safety risk to the occupants and other road users.
symptoms: Emergency lights and collision warnings appear on the dashboard
traction control begins to activate on its own
and the brakes engage sporadically at high speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the oil piston rings can cause the engine to stall unexpectedly, leading to a loss of control and potentially causing accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Vehicle Theft Due to Security Flaw
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The security flaw in Kia's vehicles can allow thieves to steal the vehicle easily, posing a safety risk to the occupants and other road users.
symptoms: and the alarm does not sound when the window is broken.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the FCA system can cause the vehicle to fail to alert the driver of an impending collision, potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: The FCA system does not work
and the driver does not receive alarms or warnings when a collision is imminent.
